An application of Chidori through a Complete Body — Susanoo, whereby Sasuke produces a massive Chidori with its primary left hand.

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the manga, this technique was named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]''. In it, Sasuke also channels Chidori through a Susanoo arm he manifests to act as his own missing forearm.
